alert.note: Alert for Lander Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued March 14 at 1:44PM MDT until March 15 at 2:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts 50 to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Lander Foothills. * WHEN...From 8 PM MDT this evening through Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest wind gusts are expected between midnight and 6 AM, then again from 9 AM through 2 PM when a cold front moves into the Wind River Basin.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
